marklogic.body:
to bill
There are Always isolated cases that make headlines. Same here in the uk. 50000 people go through the ER and one has abad experience or worse and makes the news. If it Bleeds it leads.
You can still have private care here for about £30 a month that gives you the bells and whistles like cue skipping and flat screens in rooms- and a lot of people get it- but if they can;t they still have the NHS
